cast.name: 大卫·丁布尔比 David Dimbleby

writer.name: 大卫·丁布尔比 David Dimbleby

director.name: 乔蒂·克莱普尔 Jonty Claypole

introduction: How We Built Britain was a series of six television documentaries produced by the BBC in 2007 and repeated in 2008. The series was written and presented by broadcaster David Dimbleby. In the series Dimbleby visited some of Britain's great historic buildings and examined their impact on Britain's architectural and social history.The series was a follow-up to Dimbleby's 2005 BBC One series, A Picture of Britain, which celebrated British and Irish paintings, poetry, music, and landscapes.
